value.title: What is ChatGPT and How You Can Use It
value.excerpt: What is ChatGPT, and will it change everything? How Chat GPT is AI future... (and I think it's smarter than me). In this video I'll cover exactly how the chatbot created by OpenAI is changing all industries, not just that of development and programming, and how chat gpt will be even making google redundant.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/40Kp_fa8vIw" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: ChatGPT Tutorial - A Crash Course on Chat GPT for Beginners
value.excerpt: This ChatGPT Tutorial is a Crash Course on Chat GPT for Beginners. With the increase in popularity, ChatGPT is still unknown to many people. In this video, I will provide a crash course on different ways to use ChatGPT.  ⭐ New - Teach Me OpenAI Digital Book ⭐ https://enhanceui.gumroad.com/l/teach-me-openai

value.title: How to use ChatGPT to build Business Ideas, Sites & Personal Projects
value.excerpt: ChatGPT is more than just a language model, it can be used to create websites, businesses and much more. And I would know best, as I created, built, and sold a business using OpenAI platform just this year. So in this video, I’m going to explain how to use ChatGPT and its models so you can do the same.

value.title: Advanced ChatGPT Guide - How to build your own Chat GPT Site
value.excerpt: Want to build your own ChatGPT or learn the advanced ways to use Chat GPT? This video will be a more advance tutorial about OpenAI and its AI models, how to do prompts, generate content, and finally build an application based on its API.  ⭐ New - Teach Me OpenAI Digital Book ⭐ https://enhanceui.gumroad.com/l/teach-me-openai
